objects.text: • BREATHABLE MESH • SLIP-RESISTANT SOLE • ULTRA LIGHTWEIGHT

product_details.description: Super Breathable Mesh Vamp: Lightweight, Soft, Comfortable, Wash resistance, They won't deform after clean the sneakers. Breathable and durable air mesh upper allow the foot to breathe. Protect Your ankle: Slip-on ankle design allows you easily put on/off. Shoes's tongue and heels protect your feet from hurt in any activities. Provide more comfort. Slip-Resistance and Durable:Premium Hollow Blade Sole Offers Maximum Durability and Provides the Optimum Cushioning Performance that Creates a Slow Shock Jump, Soft, Comfortableand and Healthier Shoe Environment. Perfect choice to pair with any sport or casual assemble. Suitable for parties, casual, walking, running, indoor, sports, outdoor, travel, exercise, workout and any occasion. Free Running: Stretch breathable mesh upper for ultra-lightweight support and breathability, springblade sole can superb energy return and durability, ensures your feet feel more freedom, allowing to move the way they were meant to, to enjoy the unparalleled pleasure of free running. Fabric type - Mesh ** Origin - Imported ** Sole material - Ethylene Vinyl Acetate ** Outer material - Mesh **

banner_details:
The banner is a modern and high-impact promotional design for an athletic footwear product. It features a dark, radial gradient background with dynamic graphic accents, circles, and lines that set a futuristic tone. Centralized in the layout is the product image (`product_image`), flanked by dotted circular patterns that bring focus to the sneakers. The main headline (`heading`) and subheadline (`subheading`) are stacked above the product, using bold, tech-inspired fonts for a high-energy feel. The `price` is emphasized in a shaded circular badge on the right. Supporting features (`description`) are presented near the bottom in a clean bullet style. A standout call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) sits at the bottom center.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black: #000000  
- Charcoal: #1E1E1E  
- Steel Gray: #444444  
- Cool Silver: #BBBBBB  
- Pure White: #FFFFFF  
- Dark Graphite: #2D2D2D
product_color: The product image showcases a stylish pair of athletic shoes with a bold and modern color palette. Predominantly black (#000000), the shoes exude a sleek and powerful aesthetic. Accents of bright white (#FFFFFF), seen in the branding and striped midsection, add contrast and draw focus to key design elements. The dynamic high-gloss black outsole transitions smoothly into matte fabric textures, creating depth without visual clutter. The interplay of glossy and matte black under varying lighting enhances the futuristic, edgy appeal. A fitting advertisement banner would emphasize this contrast using black, white, and subtle charcoal gray (#1C1C1C) tones for an impactful, urban look.
